Package com.buffettinc.hrms.controller.pto

Class PTORequestController

java.lang.Object
com.buffettinc.hrms.controller.pto.PTORequestController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/ptorequests") public class PTORequestController extends Object
The PTORequestController provides endpoints to handle PTORequest objects in the Buffett Inc. HRMS.
Since:
2023-07-13
Version:
1.0
Author:
IST 412 Group 5

    • viewPTORequestDetails

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public String viewPTORequestDetails(@PathVariable("id") UUID id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      This method maps to the endpoint to view the details of a PTORequest.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the PTORequest.
      model - The Model to be used.
      Returns:
      The Thymeleaf template "ptorequestDetails".

    • showNewPTORequestForm

      This method maps to the endpoint to create a new PTORequest.
      Parameters:
      model - The Model to be used.
      Returns:
      The Thymeleaf template "newPtorequestForm".

    • saveOrUpdatePTORequest

      @PostMapping("/save") public String saveOrUpdatePTORequest(@ModelAttribute("ptoRequest") PTORequest ptoRequest)
      This method maps to the endpoint to save or update a PTORequest.
      Parameters:
      ptoRequest - The PTORequest to be saved or updated.
      Returns:
      The Thymeleaf template "ptorequestDetails".

      @PostMapping("/{id}/delete") public String deletePTORequest(@PathVariable("id") UUID id)
      This method maps to the endpoint to delete a PTORequest.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the PTORequest to be deleted.
      Returns:
      The Thymeleaf template "ptorequestList".
